entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of light snow or ice pellets beginning this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
